titles.title: Pregnant and Postpartum Women Treatment Reauthorization Act
Pregnant and Postpartum Women Treatment Reauthorization Act
A bill to reauthorize the program to support residential treatment programs for pregnant and postpartum women, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
